name: GOAP Test
description:
This is a unity project that contains Two main things

  • Goal Orintated Action Planing
    • A form of game AI planing to manage a wide varity of goals, through making plans or strings of actions.
  • WorkOrderFSM
    • What I hope to be a robust, simple to use, Finite State Machine

Feel free to have a poke through my mesy code. If you have any questions about it, let me know in the comments.
